articles.title: The Earliest Signs You Have COVID, According to the Mayo Clinic - msnNOW
articles.description: Wondering which symptoms might tip you off to a case of COVID? The Mayo Clinic shares their list of most common early signs of the virus.
articles.content: Spotting a case of COVID early could very well be the key to stopping widespread transmission. And while most people know the most common symptoms of the virus, you may not know what to keep an eye o… [+1005 chars]

articles.author: Chanel Georgina
articles.title: Cervical cancer symptoms: Bleeding after sex is a warning sign of the disease - Express
articles.description: CERVICAL cancer is diagnosed in around 3,200 women in the UK each year. Affecting the neck of the womb, bleeding post coitus is one warning sign of the disease - what are the other symptoms?

articles.author: Roslyn Jimenez, Steven Cavazos
articles.title: Low Vitamin D levels may affect a person’s recovery from COVID-19 - KSAT San Antonio
articles.description: ORLANDO, Fla. (Ivanhoe Newswire) – Vitamin D is an important nutrient that helps your body absorb calcium. But studies show about 40% of Americans don’t get enough of the vitamin.
